ygData.subject: Hammer of Stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, all. I have been using the Hammer of Wrath since level 9.  I have looked all over the web to find the stats of the later hammers I can summon, but have
ygData.messageBody:
Hello, all.

I have been using the Hammer of Wrath since level 9. I have looked all over the web to find the stats of the later hammers I can summon, but have been unable to find them. Could somebody let me know the stats for the other hammers? Thanks. I know they aren't the best in "ratio", but they will always be my favorite because they are a gift from Rodcet Nife.

Also, while lurking I have noticed a lot of complaints that there aren't any cleric only weapons in the game. Heh. Who else gets to use the Hammer of Wrath? :)

Devotion
Guildmaster - Clerics of Norrath Povar
